thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 34 of 2268
thread.title: Lesley Jelley

author: Lesley Jelley
title: Lesley Jelley
text:
My first order was perfect fit blinds for my French Doors. Ease Hassle Free.
So I decided to order some more blinds my roller blind is such a good quality I cant wait for my husband to put it up. my third blind is for my front bedroom and is another roller blind but a different type. Ordering is so easy put in the size and the price is given go you immediately. will definitely be ordering more from this company.
